sentences.en: A jogger had been pushed to the ground grazing his knee.
sentences.cn: 慢跑者被推倒在地,膝盖擦破了皮.

sentences.en: a jogger out for his early morning run
sentences.cn: 一大清早在外面慢跑锻炼的人

sentences.en: Ireland looks like an abstemious jogger that has suffered a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰看似一位心脏病发作的有节制的慢跑者.

sentences.en: Premature wrinkles result when the jogger loses so much weight that they look haggard.
sentences.cn: 但一旦体重急剧下降,那时候人就会看起来很憔悴,皮肤也将提前衰老.

sentences.en: Quality running shoes are advisable, but otherwise the jogger can simply wear loose, comfortable clothing.
sentences.cn: 对于慢跑者来说,准备一双高质量的跑鞋是明智的, 但在其他方面,只要宽松 、 舒适就行了.

words.tran_cn: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；颠簸着移动
慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸

trans.tran_en: someone who runs slowly and steadily as a way of exercising
